issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi,  This what Facebook say when we submit app for review to access extra permissions[user_birthday user_location] 

 "Your app must not use a Facebook Web Dialog. Utilize our native Facebook Login SDK for iOS, so that users do not need to login twice."
fields.summary: Ti.facebook module web dialog rejected by Facebook
fields.environment:
Titanium Command-Line Interface, CLI version 3.4.1, Titanium SDK version 3.4.1.GA

facebook version=3.2.0

iOS SDK: 8.1
Building for iOS Simulator: iPhone 5s

comments.body:
HI,

Our engineer is planing release a new facebook module, and is preparing a post about it. Will update you when it is alive.

Regards,
shuo

Hi,

Please check the new Facebook module release on this post: [http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2015/03/facebook-graph-api-v2-0/] 

Regards,
Shuo
